SELECT ceo.channel, ceo.uid, dr.name, dr.time, IFNULL(sum(ceo.withdraw_money),0) withdrawAmount from config_exchange_order ceo LEFT JOIN data_register dr on ceo.uid = dr.uid where exaa_status = 5
and ceo.update_time between #{beginms} and #{endms}
and dr.channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
and dr.channel IN ( SELECT t.t_id FROM sys_tenant t WHERE t.t_type = '2' AND (t.ancestors LIKE concat('%', #{currentUserId}, '%') OR t_id = #{currentUserId}) )
GROUP BY channel,uid,dr.name ORDER BY sum(ceo.curr_money) desc LIMIT 100

SELECT curr_money from config_exchange_order where exaa_status = 5
and uid = #{uid}
and channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1

SELECT dcu.channel, dcu.uid, dr.name, dr.time, IFNULL(sum(dcu.bet_coins),0) betTotal FROM data_card_user dcu LEFT JOIN data_register dr ON dcu.uid = dr.uid
and dcu.mstime between #{beginms} and #{endms}
and dr.channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
and dr.channel IN ( SELECT t.t_id FROM sys_tenant t WHERE t.t_type = '2' AND (t.ancestors LIKE concat('%', #{currentUserId}, '%') OR t_id = #{currentUserId}) )
GROUP BY dcu.channel,dcu.uid,dr.NAME ORDER BY sum( dcu.bet_coins ) DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT uid, count(uid) count from data_card_user
and mstime between #{beginms} and #{endms}
and channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
GROUP BY uid

SELECT cro.channel, cro.uid, dr.name, dr.time, COUNT(cro.uid) rechargeCount, IFNULL(SUM(cro.recharge_amount),0) rechargeAmount, dr.login_time lastLoginTime FROM config_recharge_order cro LEFT JOIN data_register dr ON cro.uid = dr.uid
payment_status =1
and cro.finish_time between #{beginms} and #{endms}
and dr.channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
and dr.channel IN ( SELECT t.t_id FROM sys_tenant t WHERE t.t_type = '2' AND (t.ancestors LIKE concat('%', #{currentUserId}, '%') OR t_id = #{currentUserId}) )
GROUP BY cro.channel,cro.uid,dr.NAME ORDER BY sum(cro.recharge_amount) DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT after_order_money amount,recharge_type rechargeType,finish_time lastPayTime from config_recharge_order WHERE payment_status =1 and uid = #{uid}
and channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
and channel IN ( SELECT t.t_id FROM sys_tenant t WHERE t.t_type = '2' AND (t.ancestors LIKE concat('%', #{currentUserId}, '%') OR t_id = #{currentUserId}) )
ORDER BY finish_time desc LIMIT 1

SELECT cro.uid,IFNULL(SUM(cro.recharge_amount),0) rechargeAmount from config_recharge_order cro WHERE cro.payment_status = 1
and channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
and channel IN ( SELECT t.t_id FROM sys_tenant t WHERE t.t_type = '2' AND (t.ancestors LIKE concat('%', #{currentUserId}, '%') OR t_id = #{currentUserId}) )
and cro.update_time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
GROUP BY cro.uid ORDER BY rechargeAmount desc LIMIT 100
